lead_paragraph: 1:09 p.m. | Updated Box office-wise, the surprise winner of the holiday season was "War Horse," Steven Spielberg's military epic. With an absence of recognizable stars -- save perhaps, for the horse -- the film's appeal is in the very filmmaking: Mr. Spielberg's own style, of course, and that of frequent collaborators like the Oscar-winning cinematographer Janusz Kaminski and the sound designer Gary Rydstrom, who has won Oscars for "Saving Private Ryan," "Titanic," "Jurassic Park" and more.

headline.main: 'War Horse' Sound Tricks: Ice Skates for Bullets and Other Trade Secrets
